New Records: Naseem Shah's last-over sixes secured Pakistan's victory, marking a thrilling finish to the match
Key Match Events: Naseem Shah's two sixes in the final over turned the match in Pakistan's favor
Shadab Khan contributed with 36 runs and a crucial wicket
Afghanistan's collapse from 78-2 to 129-6 showcased their struggles against Pakistan's bowling
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's victory secured their place in the final, rendering subsequent matches against India and Sri Lanka irrelevant
The match was a semi-final of the ACC T20 Asia Cup
Post-Match Reflections: Shadab Khan was named Player of the Match for his all-around performance
Naseem Shah's heroics provided a psychological boost ahead of the final
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match highlighted Pakistan's resilience and ability to bounce back after a shaky start
Afghanistan's top scorer Ibrahim Zadran finished with 35 runs
Others: The match was significant as it marked Pakistan's 14th win in 17 matches within the past 12 months
